overview: Sweetheart is thrilled to present Lesbian Massage, the newest edition to the studio's award winning collection. Meet the sexy massage therapists at Lush Springs Day Spa, and their wild clients! Bitchy, ruthless casting director Dana DeArmond demands a 'happy ending' from stunned masseuse Kira Noir. Dana gets more than she bargained for when Kira gives her a piece of her mind, and then anxious divorcee Brandi Love confides in masseuse Kenna James about her cheating ex-husband, and Kenna gives Brandi a little extra care. A week later Brandi returns, hoping to get more 'deep tissue' work from Miss Kenna only to discover she has been fired, Brandi is given a new massage therapist, Sovereign Syre, who turns out to be Brandi's ex-husband's mistress. Finally, big shot CEO Magdalene St. Michaels loses patience with brand new masseuse Sarah Vandella. Magdalene decides to show the younger girl how to satisfy a powerful woman.
title: Lesbian Massage
